chapters.title: Institutional Limitations for Women in Finance
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into the various institutional barriers that women face in the finance industry, highlighting the need for systemic changes to foster inclusivity and equal opportunities.

chapters.title: Institutional Limitations
chapters.summary: Examines the structural barriers within financial institutions that hinder women's career progression, including lack of representation in leadership roles and limited access to high-profile projects.

chapters.title: Biased Policies
chapters.summary: Discusses the impact of biased policies on women's careers in finance, such as inflexible work arrangements, unequal pay, and gender-biased promotion criteria.

chapters.title: Mentorship Challenges
chapters.summary: Analyzes the lack of mentorship opportunities for women in finance, emphasizing the importance of role models and support systems for career advancement.

chapters.title: Networking Barriers
chapters.summary: Explores the difficulties women face in building professional networks within the finance industry, including exclusion from informal networks and limited access to key decision-makers.
